mita amatharawa oothadoks kristhiyani aagame ena maha sikurada dinaya, eeshrayala yudewwange yom kippur dinaya saha indiyanu hindunge diwali niwadu dinaya athuluwa thawath niwadu dina 07k melesa thawakalika niwadu washayen piliganimata lakwa atha. 1999 wasaredi ewakata shri lankawe widesha katayuthu amathyawarayawa siti lakshman kadiragamar mahathage madihathwima anuwa, eksath jathinge maha mandalaya thula wesak poson dinaya jathyanthara dinayak lesa prakashayata path kerini.
